 2000-10782000-07-170,  ,  TB,  HRDC,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS by giving effect to recent legislative amendments that allow the Minister to make direct loans to qualified students and to enter into agreements with (a) the private sector respecting the administration of those loans or other forms of financial assistance provided by the Minister and (b) with financial institutions respecting the disbursement of student loans.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0290 Publication Date: 2000-08-02
